org.knowceans.topics.simple

Class TopicMatrixPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.knowceans.topics.simple.TopicMatrixPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TopicMatrixPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    MatrixCorpus does two things: Generating a corpus for MxN topics that can be represented as rows and columns in a matrix, and displaying that matrix from given nkt.
    Author:
    gregor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
